CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

CertificateActionEnumType.description: Defines whether certificate needs to be installed or updated.

iso15118SchemaVersion.description: Schema version currently used for the 15118 session between EV and Charging Station. Needed for parsing of the EXI stream by the CSMS.

exiRequest.description: Raw CertificateInstallationReq request from EV, Base64 encoded.
